General.Name: J.S. Corrugating Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: J.S. Corrugating Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of non-standard smart equipment for use in photovoltaics, corrugated packaging, and other industries in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers corrugated cardboard production lines, including paper holder, paper splicer, preheating preconditioner, single tile machine, gluing machine and dryer, etc.; water-based printing equipment; and digital printing equipment, as well as intelligent warehousing and logistics solutions. The company also provides equipment for the photovoltaic industry comprising component intelligent equipment, including component assembly line, laminator, laser scribing machine, glass feeding machine, packaging line, etc. In addition, it engages in the auto parts casting and lithium battery equipment businesses. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.

3.Name: Mr. Jia Min  Zhou
3.Title: VP, Sec. of the Board & Director
